issue.title: Gazebo 9.0 crashed when trying to visualize links CoM of sdf model

content.raw: I think gazebo is responsible for the crash. I found out that there's a problem getting the bounding box of objects when visualizing CoM. The `ignition::math::Box` and class's default min and max values  changed from [zero](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/b86ef0a59cd116c86a1ee26b3f7dd7e49a447417/src/BoxPrivate.hh?at=ign-math3&fileviewer=file-view-default#BoxPrivate.hh-34) in ign-math3 to [MAX_D](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/b491617d72a00eea1ad119658b5858a02a86b8c3/src/BoxPrivate.hh?at=ign-math4&fileviewer=file-view-default#BoxPrivate.hh-34) in ign-math4. For visuals without any objects attached, it's returning large values which resulted in `inf` in ogre calculations. I have a fix for it and will create a pull request soon
content.html: I think gazebo is responsible for the crash. I found out that there's a problem getting the bounding box of objects when visualizing CoM. The ignition::math::Box and class's default min and max values changed from zero in ign-math3 to MAX_D in ign-math4. For visuals without any objects attached, it's returning large values which resulted in inf in ogre calculations. I have a fix for it and will create a pull request soon
